passive.name: The Plum Fragrance In My Bones
passive.description: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong>. When the wearer uses their Ultimate, increases all allies' DMG by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, lasting for {{3}} turn(s). Should the wearer's Break Effect exceed or equal {{4, percent}}%, 1 Skill Point will be recovered.\nAt the start of each wave, all allies regenerate <orangeStrong>{{5, fixed(fixed: 1)}}</orangeStrong> Energy immediately. Abilities of the same type cannot stack.
